Snow White is in my opinion a bad movie on an artistic point of view. The plot is pretty much foreseeable, the characters are stereotypes, the editing too. The movie is pale by comparison to more enjoyable Disney fairy tales, thanks to the heavy romance and mostly to the music being too melancholic. And Love is a magic. I think I will turn to different source for fairy tale-related enjoyments.
